description: Premium Instagram growth & promotion services at affordable prices.
note: Views & likes apply to your latest post. Keep your account public during delivery.

responses.terms: We provide promotional services (followers, likes, views). Your account must remain public until service completes. No password is required. We are not liable for Instagram actions (like drops or restrictions). Small variations may occur due to algorithm updates.
responses.privacy: We only collect order info (username, service type, email if provided). No passwords are ever required. We do not sell data. Limited data may be shared with payment processors or service delivery partners.
responses.refund: 100% Refund if service does not start within the promised window. Partial Refund if only part of the service is delivered. No Refund if account was private, username changed, invalid link, or violation of policies. Refunds are processed back to the original payment method.

faq.question: How long does delivery take?
faq.answer: Most orders start within the mentioned time and finish within the suggested window.

faq.question: Do I need to keep account public?

paymentFailed.response: Payment could not be processed successfully. Refund will be credited back to your account within 2-3 days. Even if money was debited or user claims fraud, the refund will be processed within 2-3 days due to server/payment gateway issues.

responses.default: Sorry, I didn't understand that. You can ask about terms, privacy, refund, FAQs, packages, trust info or payment issues.
